import React from "react"; import NavBar from "@components/navBar" import { observer, inject } from "mobx-react" import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; import './style.scss' import { toFixed } from "@utils/numberUtils"; const Home = (props: any) => { const { push } = useHistory(); const { homeState } = props; return (

Q币库存 {toFixed(homeState.data.coinAmount)}

push("/transform")}>转账

今日收益 {toFixed(homeState.data.todayIncome)}

今日成交笔数：{homeState.data.todaySuccessOrderCount}

转账

代售优惠:卡转卡 {homeState.data.cardToCardPromotionRate && homeState.data.cardToCardPromotionRate * 100}%
push("consignment")}>代售
) } export default inject('homeState')((observer(Home)));
